name: Defiance 2050: Class Founder's Pack
description:
Paradise is waiting: continue the fight in Defiance 2050!

Get in-game 3 days before anyone else, unlock all 4 initial base classes & more.

Items will be delivered once head start begins. They will not be available during beta periods.

INCLUDES
3-day Head Start
Assault Class + Outfit
Assassin Class + Outfit
Guardian Class + Outfit
Combat Medic Class + Outfit
30 Inventory Slots
TMW Hannibal 800R ATV
30-day XP Boost
“Classy” Title
